row.Docu:
This package contains actions for executing SFTP commands.
PCK.AUTOMIC_SFTP 1.0.0 Release Notes + Recursive copy

row.process:
:INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_SFTP.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH :SET &UC4RB_SFTP_RECURSIVE_GET# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_SFTP_RECURSIVE_GET#) :SET &UC4RB_SFTP_TGT_OVERWRITE# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_SFTP_TGT_OVERWRITE#) :SET &UC4RB_SFTP_PRESERVE_ATT# = STR_UC(&UC4RB_SFTP_PRESERVE_ATT#)
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS"
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SFTP_SOURCE_FILES# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_SFTP_SOURCE_FILES# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SFTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_SFTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#sftp-tool.jar" dirfilehandling GetFiles -prc "SFTP" ? -h "&UC4RB_SFTP_HOST#" ? -p "&UC4RB_SFTP_PORT#" ? -u "&UC4RB_SFTP_USER#" ? -pwd "&UC4RB_SFTP_PWD#" ? -src "&UC4RB_SFTP_SOURCE_FILES#" ? -r "&UC4RB_SFTP_RECURSIVE_GET#" ? -to "&UC4RB_SFTP_CONNECT_TIMEOUT#" ? -tgt "&UC4RB_SFTP_TGT_FILES_DIR#" ? -o "&UC4RB_SFTP_TGT_OVERWRITE#" ? -prv "&UC4RB_SFTP_PRESERVE_ATT#"
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
:CASE "UNIX"
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SFTP_SOURCE_FILES# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_SFTP_SOURCE_FILES# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = &UC4RB_SFTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_BACKWARD_TRAILING_SLASH :SET &UC4RB_SFTP_TGT_FILES_DIR# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
:JCL_CONCAT_CHAR "?" java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#sftp-tool.jar" dirfilehandling GetFiles -prc "SFTP" ? -h "&UC4RB_SFTP_HOST#" ? -p "&UC4RB_SFTP_PORT#" ? -u "&UC4RB_SFTP_USER#" ? -pwd "&UC4RB_SFTP_PWD#" ? -src "&UC4RB_SFTP_SOURCE_FILES#" ? -r "&UC4RB_SFTP_RECURSIVE_GET#" ? -to "&UC4RB_SFTP_CONNECT_TIMEOUT#" ? -tgt "&UC4RB_SFTP_TGT_FILES_DIR#" ? -o "&UC4RB_SFTP_TGT_OVERWRITE#" ? -prv "&UC4RB_SFTP_PRESERVE_ATT#" :JCL_CONCAT_CHAR
:INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX
:OTHER : STOP NOMSG, 50, "Unknown Platform" :ENDSWITCH
